The <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-membership-board|Ubuntu Membership Board]]</nowiki> is responsible for approving new Ubuntu members. The board meets at 12:00, 20:00 and 22:00 UTC as follows:

* 1st Thursday of the month: 20:00 UTC and 22:00 UTC
* 3rd Wednesday of the month: 12:00 UTC

Before applying for membership, please read and carefully follow the:

* <nowiki>[[Membership-NewMember|New Ubuntu Member Guidelines]]</nowiki>

=== Membership Candidates ===

Add yourself to the agenda to apply for Ubuntu Membership. To do this you will need to be logged into the wiki and then select the edit button at the top of the website. Then scroll down the text box to this point and follow the instructions in the comments. Further information on how to edit this page is available on the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/HelpContents|help pages]]</nowiki>.
